duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver an exceptional Customer experience by ensuring the right Team Members in place through the selection, training, and development of the team.
Cultivate an 'It can be done' attitude with the team to overcome obstacles and inspire joy for Customers.
Execute best in class sales and service strategies and deliver on sales, profit, and service targets.
Reinforce exceptional Customer service behaviors delivered by the team through accountability, recognition, and praise.
Provide value to Customers by delivering a Customer-friendly in-store and curbside shopping experience.
Lead an operationally efficient store, enabling a sales and service culture.
Drive sales growth in core businesses and oversee all aspects of merchandising and inventory replenishment.
Responsible for managing payroll, store profitability, store planning, scheduling, and task prioritization.
Hiring, training, coaching, and developing the store team to ensure they do what's right for Customers.
Create an environment that promotes Team Member engagement and retention.
Invest in training strategies/initiatives to enhance skill and capabilities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
